## Bcp47.LanguageTag class

Represents a single BCP-47 language tag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LanguageTag 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `LanguageTag` class.

</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Gets a text description of this tag.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[effectiveScript](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.effectivescript.md)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

Iana.LanguageSubtags.ScriptSubtag \| undefined


</td><td>

The effective script of this language tag, if known. The effective script is the script subtag in the tag itself, if present, or the `Suppress-Script` defined in the [IANA subtag registry](https://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry/language-subtag-registry) for the primary language of this tag. Can be `undefined` if neither the tag nor the IANA registry define a script.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isCanonical](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.iscanonical.md)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

</td><td>

Whether this language tag is in canonical form.


</td></tr>

</td><td>
